commit message: Initial commit with version 0.5 of the app. Plan is already displayed, still needs a lot error handling and ingredients display/filter.

renamed back to 'mensa' (except for app_name string in Android Manifest) and started to apply new theme

Eclipse refused to generate the R.java with the net.pherth.omnomagon
package but instead used net.pherth.mensa, so the name was changed back
to prevent problems.
icons for vegan/vegetarian/bio are now displayed
updated read me (dependencies + licence for graphics)
Fixed bug that let the app crash, when no price is specified in the table.
removed images from drawable/ fold, as unused.
fixed a bug, where the app crashed with auto reload disabled.
App now starts with the current day selected.
trying to turn of auto refresh at turning
added Option to select City (not used yet)
further code for the city integration
due to commit fail currently probably not buildable
renamed to omnomagon (finally) and it now only reloads on startup if hasn't done so today.
fix for older androids, who fucked up the background

res/values/strings.xml: Correct english for retrvData

'Schedule is refreshed' would mean that the schedule has already
been refreshed, which makes no sense for a 'please wait' dialog.
Either use 'schedule is being refreshed' or the less wordy 'refreshing schedule' to
clarify that the schedule is currently being refreshed.

res/values/strings.xml: Cosmetics

The phrase most commonly used is 'try again later'.

Merge pull request #3 from jpfender/language

Language

Merge branch 'master' of github.com:vIiRuS/Omnomagon

Conflicts:
res/values/strings.xml

* added pom.xml for maven based build
* added feature image assets
* removed old assets, removed gui code, started implementing main/menu activity with support library classes

* implemented feature image (random selection, scrolling, scaling)
* added mensa name as headline
* made status bar translucent on android L
* started implementing lists based on dummy data
* removed text-style: bold from meal group header

* lists: sorted meals and meal groups, added msc certified fish indicator, added dividers
* changed refresh icon, removed font awesome dependency
* bugfixes: removed mensa label after city selection, changed settings layout to support translucent status bars

* implemented hints for empty lists and missing configurations
* mensa, price category settings are now used to populate headlines, menu lists and error hints
* fixed minor layout errors
* triggering refresh now randomly chooses between valid and corrupted dummy data

* app now reacts on configuration changes like price group
* current day tab is now only preselected once each day
* did some refactoring to separate clearer between views and data

* added refresh indicators while refreshing
* made some sanity checks before refreshing
* showing now toasts for network and unknown errors

* food badge settings are now used for displaying items
* fixed auto-refresh bug

* added landscape layout
* applied some memory tweaks for feature image
added new icons for bio, msc, vegan and vergetarian
* app uses now live data... possibly at least (can't verify, at the moment everything is closed / has no meals scheduled)

* changed indicator logos to new versions
* removed some unused code

* removed 3 of 4 feature images
* menu item title and descriptions are now expanding
* changed wording in about activity
